assured.translation[0].definitions[1].de: certain to happen or to be achieved
assured.translation[1].definitions[0].de: the person or organization that will receive the money from an assurance agreement, or the person whose life is covered by the agreement
assured.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: A policy is of no effect until the certificate is delivered to the assured.
assured.translation[2].definitions[0].de: something that you can rely on to be available
